title: Scott lost his vision at a young age. When he was

content.question: Scott lost his vision at a young age. When he was much older, he received a treatment that allowed him to see again. After so many years of not being able to see, he had a very difficult time interpreting visual information such as faces and expressions. His visual problems most likely came from processing difficulties in the

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
